hudson.tasks.Shell.command: export VMNAME="RS-$$" /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init login /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init build /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init start /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'wget http://home.zcu.cz/~bodik/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ################ /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh rsyslog-server.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'ps faxu' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x tests/test_rsyslog7_installed.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x tests/test_rsyslog-server_netstat.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x tests/test_rsyslog-server_avahi.sh'
